content: a yarn needle with the working end of the body insert needle behind four stitches on the back of the head between row 3 & 4 and draw the working yarn through one stitch pull it tight and continue stitch head to the body three to four times and bind off you can weave in the end or thread it through the backside in the hypothetical location of espeeder s spinnerets this makes a very convenient hanger or something to hold onto as you spin him through the air and into the lap of an unsuspecting bystander legs i have made the legs in four different colors to show you how to attach them pinch four legs together so yarn ends are all facing down with the far yarn end stitch through all four legs forward and back three to four times we shall call this the leg-wad behold the mighty leg-wad please note that the working end of the back leg has been threaded through to the front leg line legs up with head just behind the eye and stitch the top of the first three between row 4 & 5 stitch the final leg to the body then continue stitching downward sewing the undersides of the leg-wad to the underside of espeeder s head thread ends individually through espeeder s head to weave in then trim repeat on opposite side
